text: Nabeel Qureshi (April 13, 1983 - September 16, 2017) was an American Christian apologist writer and speaker, converted from Islam to Christianity. He was born in California. Qureshi was a speaker with Ravi Zacharias International Ministries (RZIM) and the author of three books, Seeking Allah, Finding Jesus: A Devout Muslim Encounters Christianity (Zondervan, February 2014), Answering Jihad: A Better Way Forward (Zondervan, March 2016), and No God But Oneâ€”Allah or Jesus (Zondervan, August 2016).
